name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
role_name: Senior Technical Regional Service Engineer - EMEA
profile_summary:
Experienced Senior Technical Regional Service Engineer with a robust background in technical support, troubleshooting, and field service. Proven project management skills with a strong focus on quality assurance and effective relationship management. Adept in training and developing technical documentation to streamline processes and support users effectively. 

Bringing 13+ years of expertise as a Full Stack Developer within the healthcare and financial sectors, with proficiency in **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**. Specialized in both frontend and backend development utilizing **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Demonstrated capability in deploying AI/ML-powered platforms, enhancing real-time processing and predictive analytics.

Hands-on experience in developing cloud-native systems on **AWS** and **Azure**, implementing microservices, event-driven architectures, and CI/CD pipelines. Strong commitment to compliance with standards such as HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2. Extensive MLOps knowledge, encompassing model training, serving, and orchestration with **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.
